text: qal fireawn llshrt: asddaqtm bmwsa, watbetmwh, waqrrtm lah qabl 'an adhan lakum bdhlk? 'iina musaa laezymkm aladhi eallamkm alshr; fldhlk tabetmwh, flaqtenn 'aydiakum wa'arjulakum mkhalfana bynha, ydana min jihat wrijla min aljihat alakhra, wlaslbnnakm - brbt ajsadkm - ealaa judhue alnkhl, wltelmnn 'ayuha alsaharat ayna: 'ana 'aw rabi musaa 'ashadu edhabana min alakhr, wadwm lh?
